summary.span: Provides methods to place data on and retrieve data from the system Clipboard.

span.span: Provides methods to place data on and retrieve data from the system Clipboard.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用的预定义格式的列表为类，请参阅类。For a list of predefined formats to use with the class, see the class. 调用以将数据放在剪贴板上，取代其当前的内容。Call to put data on the Clipboard, replacing its current contents. 若要将持久数据的副本放在剪贴板上，设置`copy`参数`true`。To place a persistent copy of the data on the Clipboard, set the `copy` parameter to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 若要将数据放到剪贴板上多个格式中，使用类或实现。To place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats, use the class or an implementation. 将数据放置在剪贴板中多种格式，以最大化目标应用程序，你可能不知道，其格式要求可以成功检索数据的可能性。Place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats to maximize the possibility that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can successfully retrieve the data. 调用从剪贴板检索数据。Call to retrieve data from the Clipboard. 为实现的对象返回的数据接口。The data is returned as an object that implements the interface. 使用指定的方法和字段中从对象中提取数据。Use the methods specified by and fields in to extract the data from the object. 如果不知道你检索的数据格式，调用方法接口来获取该数据的所有格式的列表存储在。If you do not know the format of the data you retrieved, call the method of the interface to get a list of all formats that data is stored in. 然后调用方法接口，并指定你的应用程序可以使用的格式。Then call the method of the interface, and specify a format that your application can use. 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]、类提供的其他方法，它可以更轻松地使用系统剪贴板。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with the system Clipboard. 调用方法从剪贴板中删除所有数据。Call the method to remove all data from the Clipboard. 若要将特定的格式的数据添加到剪贴板，替换现有数据，调用相应`Set`*格式*方法，如，或调用方法来指定格式。To add data of a particular format to the Clipboard, replacing the existing data, call the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as , or call the method to specify the format. 若要从剪贴板中检索特定格式的数据，请先调用相应`Contains`*格式*方法 (如) 方法来确定剪贴板是否包含中的数据，设置的格式，，然后调用适当`Get`*格式*方法 (如) 来检索数据，如果剪贴板包含它。To retrieve data of a particular format from the Clipboard, first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as ) method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in that format, and then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as ) to retrieve the data if the Clipboard contains it. 若要在这些操作中指定的格式，调用和方法相反。To specify the format in these operations, call the and methods instead. > [!NOTE] > 所有基于 Windows 的应用程序共享系统剪贴板，因此内容可能会发生更改时切换到另一个应用程序。All Windows-based applications share the system Clipboard, so the contents are subject to change when you switch to another application. > > 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放在剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果将非可序列化对象传递给剪贴板方法时，该方法将失败而不引发异常。If you pass a non-serializable object to a Clipboard method, the method will fail without throwing an exception. 请参阅有关序列化的详细信息。See for more information on serialization. 如果目标应用程序需要一种非常具体的数据格式，标头添加到序列化过程中的数据可能会阻止应用程序不能识别你的数据。If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data. 若要保留数据格式，请添加你的数据作为数组到并将传递到方法。To preserve your data format, add your data as a array to a and pass the to the method. > > 类仅在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法标记为属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. > > 使用剪贴板使用图元文件格式时，可能需要特殊的注意事项。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard. 由于在当前实现中的限制使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别类，使用.NET Framework 的图元文件格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在这种情况下，你必须进行互操作与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口 (Api)。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). 有关详细信息，请参阅 323530，"图元文件上剪贴板是不可见对所有应用程序，"在 Microsoft 知识库文章在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用将数据置于和从系统剪贴板中检索它的方法。The following code example uses methods to place data on and retrieve it from the system Clipboard. 此代码假定`button1`， `button2`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已创建并已放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on the form. `button1_Click`方法调用从文本框提取选定的文本并将其放置在系统剪贴板上。The `button1_Click` method calls to take selected text from the text box and place it on the system Clipboard. `button2_Click`方法调用从系统剪贴板中检索数据。The `button2_Click` method calls to retrieve data from the system Clipboard. 该代码使用和提取返回的数据并显示中的数据`textBox2`。The code uses and to extract the data returned and displays the data in `textBox2`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序退出时，数据将从系统剪贴板中删除。Data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits. 此方法尝试在 100 毫秒的时间间隔，十倍中设置数据，则引发如果所有尝试都均失败。This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an if all attempts are unsuccessful. > [!NOTE] > 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放在剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果将非可序列化对象传递给此方法时，它将失败而不引发异常。If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception. 请参阅有关序列化的详细信息。See for more information on serialization. > > 类仅在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法标记为属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用放置到系统剪贴板上的非持久性文本数据。The following code example uses to place nonpersistent text data onto the system Clipboard. 在`button1_Click`方法，从复制所选的文本`textBox1`并将其粘贴到剪贴板上。In the `button1_Click` method, the selected text is copied from `textBox1` and pasted on the Clipboard. 在`button2_Click`方法时，信息将从剪贴板检索并显示在`textBox2`。In the `button2_Click` method, the information is retrieved from the Clipboard and displayed in `textBox2`. 此代码假定`button1`， `button2`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已创建并已放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`copy`参数是`false`，将从系统剪贴板中的应用程序退出时删除数据。If the `copy` parameter is `false`, the data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits. 此方法尝试在 100 毫秒的时间间隔，十倍中设置数据，则引发如果所有尝试都均失败。This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an if all attempts are unsuccessful. > [!NOTE] > 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放在剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果将非可序列化对象传递给此方法时，它将失败而不引发异常。If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception. 请参阅有关序列化的详细信息。See for more information on serialization. > > 类仅在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法标记为属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 以下方法在应用程序中运行。The following method is run in an application. 它将选定的文本数据的永久副本放置在系统剪贴板上的文本框中。It places a persistent copy of the selected text data in the text box on the system Clipboard. 此代码假定`button1`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已创建并已放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button1`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 在不同应用程序中，以下方法从系统剪贴板中检索文本，并将粘贴到文本`textBox2`。In a different application, the following method retrieves the text from the system Clipboard and pastes the text into `textBox2`. 此代码假定`button2`和`textBox2`已创建并已放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button2` and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果剪贴板正忙于处理另一个线程或应用程序，可以偶尔也会失败将数据添加到剪贴板。Adding data to the Clipboard can occasionally fail if the Clipboard is busy with another thread or application. 此方法很有用，若要解决此问题的大量使用剪贴板的环境。This method is useful to work around this issue in environments with heavy Clipboard use. 如果`copy`参数是`false`，将从系统剪贴板中的应用程序退出时删除数据。If the `copy` parameter is `false`, the data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits. > [!NOTE] > 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放在剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果将非可序列化对象传递给此方法时，它将失败而不引发异常。If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception. 请参阅有关序列化的详细信息。See for more information on serialization. > > 类仅在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法标记为属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件下拉列表是一个包含文件的路径信息的字符串集合。A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files. 文件放置列表存储在剪贴板上数组。A file drop list is stored on the Clipboard as a array. 此方法将转换`filePaths`到之前将其添加到剪贴板的数组。This method converts `filePaths` to a array before adding it to the Clipboard. 若要从剪贴板中检索文件下拉列表，请先使用方法来确定剪贴板是否包含该格式的数据检索之前方法。To retrieve a file drop list from the Clipboard, first use the method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in that format before retrieving it with the method. > [!NOTE] > 类仅在设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式的线程中使用。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法标记为属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的示例演示此成员。The following example demonstrates this member.
